ya2.2.2:1.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:2.1: Asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.

ya2.2.2:41.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:42.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:43.1: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ ye ca arūpaṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhissati.

ya2.2.2:110.1: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:111.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:112.1: Sabbesaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:113.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:114.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:115.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:116.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:118.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:119.1: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:120.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:121.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhati. Arūpe parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:122.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:123.1: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:124.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.2:125.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.2:126.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:127.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:128.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:129.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:130.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:131.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.2:133.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:134.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:135.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:136.1: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nirujjhittha. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:137.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:138.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:139.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:140.1: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhittha. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:141.1: Yassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:142.1: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:143.1: Yassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.2:144.1: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:146.1: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:147.1: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha, vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:148.1: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:149.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho na nirujjhittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
ya2.2.2:150.1: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.2:151.1: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.2:152.1: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhitthāti?
ya2.2.2:153.1: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhittha.
